description: Small and sneaky, the Snotling Scrapper is a lowly goblinoid that lurks in the shadows of larger orcish warbands. Though weak individually, these creatures are fierce when cornered, lashing out with crude weapons and dirty tricks.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.description: The Snotling Scrapper can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Throw Sand
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 10 ft., one target. Hit: The target must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.
